field.name: description
field.value:
My intention is to get familiar with the RemotingFacility from the Castle Project to realize the following secenario: I want to create a client - server application where the business logic can be located on a server and a client offers an user interface (and nothing else) . The server should use dependency injection to avoid heavy, expensive dependencies between different objects. The client should only be able to access an object through an interface so that a server has to offer some object via remoting.
The base for my solution is the sample "RemoteSample" (i altered it a little bit because it was configured for an older version of the RemotingFacility and it did not function as it was) from the Castle Project binaries. I am using the container on both endpoints. The configuration from http://www.castleproject.org/index.php/Facility:RemotingFacility (last scenario on the page) does not function (or I do not know how to use it?) for my solution.
Now when I start the client application I get an error message as follows: "Additional information: Attempted to call a method declared on type RemoteSample.Components.IRemoteConsole on an object which exposes Castle.Facilities.Remoting.RemotingRegistry."
For better understanding i attached my solution to this Jira-Isue.
